body: I liked this guys work, "Sharehouse". It was sweet. You felt for the protagonist. This one, however, is downright despicable, to say the least. Just where is the author going with this story...?

How this douche bag did not catch a bullet yet lmao irl i would beat his ass, if i cant cause of kung foo im going gun foo on his ass. Thats the least that can happen he destroyed these ppls relationships cause its fun to him
